CustomField.description: Field that is used to track if a T2T Assessment has been completed for a given progress note, displaying this field in the record is a visual confirmation for the user, and the T2T flow checks this field to decide if another T2T Assessment can be launched.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if a Test to Treat assessment has been completed for this patient.
CustomField.label: T2T Assessment Completed
